item.description:
Sorry for the change. I will be driving across the country that week.

I'm also moving the time to 7:00 pm.

For those that are driving: You can park in some of the commercial spaces in front of trident after 7pm. They do fill up by 7:05 so be there 10 minutes and just wait in your car.

Thanks!

group.name: Boston Web Design (and Dev) Meetup Group

item.name: The Boston Web Design January Meetup
